sentences.en: Diana seemed a strong young girl who could be counted upon to produce an heir.
sentences.cn: 戴安娜看起来是个年轻健壮的女孩，应该能生下继承人。

sentences.en: He claims to be the rightful heir.
sentences.cn: 他要求做合法的继承人.

sentences.en: He recognized John as his lawful heir.
sentences.cn: 他确认约翰为他的合法继承人.
他以继承人身分获得财产.

sentences.en: He wanted to beget an heir.
He was seen as Mr Olsen's heir apparent.
sentences.cn: 他被视为奥尔森先生理所当然的继任者。

sentences.en: He was the legal heir to the throne.
sentences.cn: 他是王位的合法继承人.

sentences.en: His heir sold the painting to the London art dealer Agnews.
sentences.cn: 他的继承人把这幅画卖给了伦敦艺术品经销商阿格纽斯。

sentences.en: In the UK, it is customary for the next heir to the throne to be regent.
sentences.cn: 在英国, 通常由下一位王位继承人摄政.

sentences.en: John was the sole heir to a vast estate.
sentences.cn: 约翰是一大笔遗产的唯一继承人。

sentences.en: Jonson was his political heir as leader of the party.
sentences.cn: 琼森是他的政治接班人，他将担任该党派的领袖。

sentences.en: Nash did not live a cloistered existence nor was he spared the shocks that flesh is heir to.
sentences.cn: 纳什并非过着与世隔绝的生活,他同样也不能逃脱人生难免的种种打击.

sentences.en: The Earl of Arundel's heir was restored to his inheritance and granted the lordship of Chirk.
sentences.cn: 阿伦德尔伯爵的继承人重新取得了继承权,并获封为切克勳爵.

sentences.en: The King's eldest son is the heir to the throne.
sentences.cn: 国王的长子是王位的继承人.

sentences.en: to be heir to a large fortune
We don't recognised him to be the lawful heir.
sentences.cn: 我们不承认他为合法继承人.

sentences.en: Who was the true heir to the throne?
sentences.cn: 谁是真正的王位继承人?

phrases.tran_cn: [律]法定继承人，有确定继承权的人

trans.tran_en: the person who has the legal right to receive the property or title of another person when they die
